message.content:
{
  "introText": "Here are some surprising and unexpected facts for you:",
  "body": [
    "Bees sometimes sting other bees when they're cranky.",
    "A kangaroo once challenged a politician to an arm-wrestling match.",
    "Mammoths still roamed the earth when the Egyptian pyramids were being built.",
    "In ancient Rome, ferrets were used as a form of pest control.",
    "Cows have best friends and can become distressed if they're separated."
  ],
  "hashtag": "#BizarreFacts #UnexpectedKnowledge #RandomTrivia"
}
